At Tue, 24 Jun 2008 18:24:07 -0000,
"grahlaura" <lgrah@...> wrote:
>
> Hello,
>
> I have searched this list and found some indirect references, but would
> like to ask directly--is anyone successfully running Heritrix,
> especially a recent version, on a Solaris?  Any issues?

We are running Heritrix 1.12.1 and 1.14.0 on Solaris 10; no issues so
far as I can see. Well, there is one issue that I have encountered (it
should be in the list archives), but I do not think that this is
Solaris specific.

best,
Erik Hetzner
